column6: Still threatened by the deadly Phalanx virus, Richard Rider finally reaches Kvch, the never-before-seen Technarchy homeworld. But are the "parents" of the Phalanx still there â€" and can Nova even reach them? Guest starring Warlock from New Mutants!
